Doak ejected by Ump Klem. Doak objected to a strike called on him while he was at bat. A long argument with Klem ensued, resulting in an ejection. SLS: Doak 'was gently eased out of the pastime without anybody knowing about it.'

$After a wide ball had been pitched, Fournier walked toward the box as if to express words of encouragement.  This led the unsuspecting Blades to stray several feet away from 1B, and the next instant Johnston slipped up behind him to catch a snap throw from Taylor, catching Blades flat-footed.
$Hit in head, knocked unconscious. He was able to walk to the bench when he came to, helped by his teammates.
$The ball bounded and hit Fournier in the mouth. He was bleeding freely and time was called to administer first aid.
